Diagnosis
	1. Ascending colon adenocarcinoma, ypT3N0M0
	Date of diagnosis
	January 2024

	Treatment aim
	Curative

	Summary of completed treatment and relevant dates

	Surgery
	15 Mar 2024 Right hemicolectomy

	Chemotherapy
	Neoadjuvant FOLFOX completed Feb 2024

	Clinical studies
	PRECISION-Panc umbrella study - Arm C (Copanlisib)

	Current disease status
	No evidence of disease

	Current issues
	Grade 3 hyperglycemia, Grade 2 hypertension

	Summary of consultation
	Reviewed today on cycle 3 of trial medication. Blood pressure remains elevated at 158/95 despite increased amlodipine. Random glucose 13.2 mmol/L requiring temporary suspension of trial medication. Performance status remains 1. No other toxicities noted. CT scan performed last week shows no evidence of recurrence.

	Further investigations
	Daily glucose monitoring
Weekly BP checks
Repeat CT in 6 weeks as per protocol

	Medication prescribed
	Amlodipine increased to 10mg daily
Metformin 500mg bd started

	Follow up
	Next trial assessment in 2 weeks with protocol-mandated blood tests
Weekly BP checks with trial nurse

	Required GP actions
	Monitor blood pressure and glucose. Alert trial team if systolic BP >160 or glucose >15
